A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The most worrying thing is how did this get 92% from critics - did they see a different movie \, were they bought off !!??? Hated it! The worst Star Wars film ever\, the first one I didn’t even enjoy. Yes\, much much worse to my mind than Phantom Menace. Souless \, humourless\, way overlong \, bad rehash of original movies themes . Very strange reviews- critics loved it but audiences are hammering it - including many long time star wars fans like me - who have been there since 1977- it was plain boring . Just feel badly let down.
